Class Slower

  • public class Slower
extends greenfoot.Actor
    The slower class is an item that makes the player walk slowly if the player touches it

    • Constructor Detail

      • Slower

        public Slower()
        Sets the image for the slower item. All the actual code for slowing the player is located in the player class because it makes more sense. I also made the player remove the slower when it touched it instead of the slower doing that itself, this was to avoid the same bug where the object would remove itself before the player could sense that it was touching the object and react.
